attackStats.name: Attack
attackStats.detail: <bg src={/class-icons/flora/adele/recalling-greatness.png} tip={Recalling Greatness (Beginner Skill)} val={+10%}> <bg src={/class-icons/flora/adele/martial-discipline.png} tip={Martial Discipline (1st Job)} val={+30}> <bg src={/class-icons/flora/adele/bladecaster-control.png} tip={Bladecaster Control (2nd Job)} val={+30}> <bg src={/class-icons/flora/adele/ascent.png} tip={Ascent (3rd Job)} val={+30}> <bg src={/class-icons/flora/adele/bladecaster-expertise.png} tip={Bladecaster Expertise (4th Job)} val={+30}> <bg src={/class-icons/flora/adele/strive.png} tip={Strive (4th Job)} val={+30}> <bg src={/class-icons/flora/magic-conversion.png} tip={Magic Conversion (Beginner Skill)} val={35% of Magic Attack from equipment - excluding weapon} val={Cannot exceed 15% of weapon's base Magic Attack}> <bg type={opt} src={/class-icons/5th-job/grandis-goddess-blessing.png} tip={Grandis Goddess's Blessing (5th Job)} val={+100 & 100% of Magic Attack from equipment - excluding weapon} val={Cannot exceed 150% of weapon's base Magic Attack}>

attackStats.detail: <bg val={Base +5%}> <bg src={/class-icons/flora/adele/ascent.png} tip={Ascent (3rd Job)} val={+20%}> <bg src={/class-icons/flora/adele/strive.png} tip={Strive (4th Job)} val={+20%}>

attackStats.name: Crit Damage

attackStats.name: Damage
attackStats.detail: <bg src={/class-icons/flora/adele/bladecaster-expertise.png} tip={Bladecaster Expertise (4th Job)} val={+20%}> <bg src={/class-icons/flora/adele/strive.png} tip={Strive (4th Job)} val={+10%}> <bg src={/class-icons/link-skills/noble-fire.png} tip={Noble Fire (Link Skill)} val={+2% per party member} val={(Max. +8%)}> <bg type={temp} src={/class-icons/flora/adele/divine-wrath.png} tip={Divine Wrath (Hyper Skill)} val={+10%}> <bg type={temp} src={/class-icons/flora/adele/legacy-restoration.png} tip={Legacy Restoration (5th Job)} val={+45%}> <bg type={opt} src={/class-icons/flora/adele/true-nobility-shield-reinforce.png} tip={True Nobility - Shield Reinforce (Hyper Skill)} val={+15%}> <bg type={opt} src={/class-icons/5th-job/conversion-overdrive.png} tip={Conversion Overdrive (5th Job)} val={up to +45%}> <bg type={opt} src={/class-icons/5th-job/impenetrable-skin.png} tip={Impenetrable Skin (5th Job)} val={+6% when hit up to +30%}>

attackStats.detail: <bg src={/class-icons/flora/adele/ascent.png} tip={Ascent (3rd Job)} val={+17%}> × <bg src={/class-icons/flora/adele/ruination.png} tip={Ruination (4th Job)} val={+30%}> × <bg src={/class-icons/flora/adele/resonance-rush.png} tip={Resonance Rush (2nd Job)} val={+10% per stack} val={(Max. +20%)}> × <bg type={opt} src={/class-icons/5th-job/weapon-aura.png} tip={Weapon Aura (5th Job)} val={+6%}>

build: <tt src={/class-icons/flora/adele/jaunt.png} tip={Vault}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/flora/adele/martial-discipline.png} tip={Martial Discipline}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/flora/adele/blade-of-will.png} tip={Blade of Will}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/flora/adele/magic-dispatch.png} tip={Magic Dispatch}>

<tt src={/class-icons/common/physical-training.png} tip={Elite Training}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/flora/adele/will-to-live.png} tip={Will to Live}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/flora/adele/bladecaster-control.png} tip={Bladecaster Control}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/flora/adele/weave-infusion.png} tip={Weave Infusion}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/flora/adele/aetherial-arms.png} tip={Aetherial Arms}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/flora/adele/aether-forge.png} tip={Aether Forge}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/flora/adele/resonance-rush.png} tip={Resonance Rush}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/flora/adele/impale.png} tip={Impale}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/flora/adele/skewering.png} tip={Skewering}>

<tt src={/class-icons/flora/adele/feather-float.png} tip={Feather Float}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/flora/adele/tolerance.png} tip={Tolerance}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/flora/adele/true-nobility.png} tip={True Nobility}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/flora/adele/ascent.png} tip={Ascent}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/flora/adele/hunting-decree.png} tip={Hunting Decree}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/flora/adele/eviscerate.png} tip={Eviscerate}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/flora/adele/noble-summons.png} tip={Noble Summons}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/flora/adele/reign-of-destruction.png} tip={Reign of Destruction}>

<tt src={/class-icons/flora/adele/ruination.png} tip={Ruination}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/flora/adele/strive.png} tip={Strive}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/flora/adele/perfection.png} tip={Perfection}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/flora/adele/bladecaster-expertise.png} tip={Bladecaster Expertise}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/flora/adele/cleave.png} tip={Cleave}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/flora/adele/hero-of-the-flora.png} tip={Hero of the Flora}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/flora/adele/aether-bloom.png} tip={Aether Bloom}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/flora/adele/aether-guard.png} tip={Aether Guard}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/flora/adele/plummet.png} tip={Plummet}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/flora/adele/grave-proclamation.png} tip={Grave Proclamation}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/flora/adele/floran-heros-will.png} tip={Floran Hero's Will}>
details: All 1st to 4th Job skills can be maxed
Put one SP into each skill first and then max each skill in this order
For any skills that have prerequisites, follow them first before following build path

hyperBuild.recommended: <bp_<tt src={/class-icons/flora/adele/resonance-rush-efficiency.png} tip={Resonance Rush - Efficiency}> Resonance Rush - Efficiency_<tt src={/class-icons/flora/adele/reign-of-destruction-persist.png} tip={Reign of Destruction - Persist}> Reign of Destruction - Persist_<tt src={/class-icons/flora/adele/aether-bloom-cooldown-cutter.png} tip={Aether Bloom - Cooldown Cutter}> Aether Blossom - Cooldown Cutter_<tt src={/class-icons/flora/adele/true-nobility-shield-reinforce.png} tip={True Nobility - Shield Reinforce}> True Nobility - Shield Reinforce_<tt src={/class-icons/flora/adele/aether-guard-persist.png} tip={Aether Guard - Persist}> Aether Guard - Persist_>

nodes: <tt src={/class-icons/flora/adele/cleave.png} tip={Cleave (4th Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/flora/adele/reign-of-destruction.png} tip={Reign of Destruction and Plummet (3rd Job / 4th Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/flora/adele/aether-forge.png} tip={Aether Forge and Noble Summons (2nd Job / 3rd Job)}>

<tt src={/class-icons/flora/adele/hunting-decree.png} tip={Hunting Decree and Grave Proclamation (3rd Job / 4th Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/flora/adele/magic-dispatch.png} tip={Magic Dispatch and Aetherial Arms (1st Job / 2nd Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/flora/adele/aether-bloom.png} tip={Aether Bloom and Blade Torrent (4th Job / Hyper Skill)}>
notes: Any combination of these skills are good but preferred from same category as you want to max primary first
4 Boost Nodes total are needed to reach Master Level 60 for these skills (with Matrix Points used)<bp_Nodes with the same Main Skill (skill at the top) cannot be equipped at the same time_>

possible.nodes: <tt src={/class-icons/flora/adele/blade-of-will.png} tip={Blade of Will (1st Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/flora/adele/magic-dispatch.png} tip={Magic Dispatch and Aetherial Arms (1st Job / 2nd Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/flora/adele/skewering.png} tip={Skewering (2nd Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/flora/adele/impale.png} tip={Impale, Resonance Rush, and Shardbreaker (2nd Job / Hyper Skill)}> <tt src={/class-icons/flora/adele/aether-forge.png} tip={Aether Forge and Noble Summons (2nd Job / 3rd Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/flora/adele/eviscerate.png} tip={Eviscerate (3rd Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/flora/adele/reign-of-destruction.png} tip={Reign of Destruction and Plummet (3rd Job / 4th Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/flora/adele/cleave.png} tip={Cleave (4th Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/flora/adele/hunting-decree.png} tip={Hunting Decree and Grave Proclamation (3rd Job / 4th Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/flora/adele/aether-bloom.png} tip={Aether Bloom and Blade Torrent (4th Job / Hyper Skill)}>

extraContent.title: Aether Weaving
extraContent.content:
Adele has a secondary resource (unlocked in 2nd Job) called Aether Weaving that is used to activate certain skills and create 'Aether Swords' that can be commanded. Aether Weaving is generated passively and whenever you attack an enemy with a 'Trigger' skill

  • Every 100 'Aether Weaving', an Aether Sword is readied
  • When a sword is readied, you can summon it using Hunting Decree (3rd Job)
  • These swords are used primarily for and cannot be used before 3rd Job
  • Each sword represents 100 AE which skills that consume AE can use
  • In 2nd Job, you can hold up to 2 Swords (200 AE) at a time and 3 Swords (300 AE) in 4th Job+
  • Note if you use any skill that consumes AE, your Aether Sword will disappear and be consumed as AE

Below is a list of all Trigger skills:

  • Skewering (2nd Job)
  • Eviscerate (3rd Job)
  • Cleave (4th Job)
  • Plummet (4th Job)

primary.name: Artistic Recall
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 30, you move to Ristonia.\nCooldown: 600 sec

primary.name: Magic Conversion
primary.shortDesc: 35% of your equipment's Magic ATT is converted to Attack Power, excluding your weapon. Any set effects do not apply. Only converts up to 15% of your weapon's base Attack Power.

primary.name: Recalling Greatness
primary.shortDesc: Critical Damage: +10%, Attack Power: +10%
details: This skill is gained and leveled up by completing the Adele storyline<bp_The storyline spans all the way up to Lv. 200_>

primary.name: Exclusive Spell
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 30, increases Attack Power & Magic ATT by 4% for 2400 sec\nCooldown: 300 sec
details: To obtain this skill, complete Adele's storyline and the quest <link href={https://maplestorywiki.net/w/Quests/235/Final_Sword%27s_Calling_3} title={"Final Sword's Calling 3"}>
Affects all nearby players

primary.name: Blade of Will
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 12, Damage: 85%, Number of Attacks: 4, Max Enemies Hit: 5
primary.desc: Swing a sword forward

primary.name: Magic Dispatch
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 20, Damage: 80%, Number of Attacks: 3, Magical Shards: 5\nCooldown: 6 sec
primary.desc: Create shards that seek out nearby enemies
details: Unaffected by Damage Reflect

primary.name: Jaunt
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 5, allows you to jump a greater distance
primary.desc: Double jump skill
details: Can be assigned a Key Slot or activated by pressing jump twice<bp_While in the air, if you combine this with the Up Arrow Key, you will perform a vertical jump_>

primary.name: High Rise
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 20, allows you to remain in the air for a short time
primary.desc: While in the air, press the Skill Key or press the Up Arrow Key twice to float for a short period of time
details: Using the skill again or using <tt src={/class-icons/flora/adele/jaunt.png} tip={Jaunt (1st Job)}> will stop the skill
Right-clicking the skill will toggle a lock to prevent it from activating with the Arrow Keys
To unlock this skill, you need to complete Adele's storyline

primary.name: Martial Discipline
primary.shortDesc: Attack Power: +30, Defense: +200, Max HP: +1000\nSpeed: +17, Jump: +10, Max Speed: 10, Knockback Resistance: +60%\nDamage Taken: -10%

primary.name: Aether Weaving
primary.shortDesc: Obtain 5 aether at regular intervals, obtain 12 aether when Trigger skill hits, can obtain up to 300.\nWhen Aether Forge is active, every 100 aether can create 2 aether swords. Up to 4 aether swords can be created at a time.
primary.desc: A special resource that generates passively and whenever you attack an enemy with a "Trigger" skill

primary.name: Aether Crystal
primary.shortDesc:
Duration: 30 sec, up to 7 can exist on the map.
If the max limit is reached and another one is created, the crystal with the lowest duration vanishes.
The crystal cannot be created near another crystal, or near certain platforms such as those that cannot be reached.
Cooldown: 4 sec
primary.desc: Successful Aether Sword attacks have a chance to leave behind a crystal
details: Using <tt src={/class-icons/flora/adele/resonance-rush.png} tip={Resonance Rush (2nd Job)}> will dash towards the crystals consuming it
Up to 7 crystals can be active at a time<bp_Creating a new crystal will cause the oldest crystal to expire if there are already 7 crystals active_>

primary.name: Skewering
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 25, Damage: 80%, Number of Attacks: 8, Max Enemies Hit: 6
primary.desc: Launch multiple swords forward

primary.name: Aether Forge
primary.shortDesc:
When Trigger Skill hits, deal 200% damage to up to 10 enemies every 9.5 sec Reaching your 3rd and 4th job will reduce attack cooldown by 4 sec each.
Attack 1 times per aether sword.
Each successful attack has a 30% chance to create an aether crystal.
Cooldown: 0.5 sec
primary.desc: While toggled, successful Trigger skill attacks trigger Aether Swords to brandish forward that have a chance to leave behind a <tt src={/class-icons/flora/adele/aether-crystal.png} tip={Aether Crystal (2nd Job)}>
details: The size of the attack changes based on the amount of Aether Energy you have currently
<tt src={/class-icons/flora/adele/hunting-decree.png} tip={Hunting Decree (3rd Job)}> can only be activated when this skill is toggled on
Cooldown of the attack is reduced each Job Advancement
Unaffected by Damage Reflect

primary.name: Impale
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 45, Aether Cost: 15\nDamage: 85%, Number of Attacks: 6, Max Enemies Hit: 6\nCooldown: 7 sec
primary.desc: Launch forward an Aether Sword that leaves behind a <tt src={/class-icons/flora/adele/aether-crystal.png} tip={Aether Crystal (2nd Job)}>
details: Using the Arrow Keys will guide the direction the Aether Sword is launched

Can be linked with <tt src={/class-icons/flora/adele/resonance-rush.png} tip={Resonance Rush (2nd Job)}> to quickly dash but no <tt src={/class-icons/flora/adele/aether-crystal.png} tip={Aether Crystal (2nd Job)}> crystal will be created

primary.name: Resonance Rush
primary.shortDesc: Aether crystal used with Resonance Rush vanishes.\nDamage: 502%, Number of Attacks: 6, Max Enemies Hit: 6\nWhen attack hits, a buff triggers for 30 sec that increases final damage by 10% and Enemy DEF ignored by 10%. Can be stacked up to 2 times.
primary.desc: Lunge a sword forward while dashing
details: Can only be used when there is a nearby <tt src={/class-icons/flora/adele/aether-crystal.png} tip={Aether Crystal (2nd Job)}> or when linked with <tt src={/class-icons/flora/adele/impale.png} tip={Impale (2nd Job)}><bp_<tt src={/class-icons/flora/adele/aether-crystal.png} tip={Aether Crystal (2nd Job)}> crystal will disappear if you dash to it_>
If the attack is successful, gain a stacking buff that increases %Final Damage and %Ignore DEF
Pressing together with an Arrow Keys controls the direction you dash

primary.name: Aetherial Arms
primary.shortDesc: When Trigger Skill hits, creates shard every 8 sec, consume 25 MP upon creation.\nMagic Dispatch and Aetherial Arms Damage: +30%p\nCooldown: 0.5 sec
primary.desc: While toggled, successful Trigger skill attacks periodically activates <tt src={/class-icons/flora/adele/magic-dispatch.png} tip={Magic Dispatch (1st Job)}>
details: [Passive]: Permanently increases %Damage of <tt src={/class-icons/flora/adele/magic-dispatch.png} tip={Magic Dispatch (1st Job)}> by a flat amount

primary.name: Weave Infusion
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 10, Increases attack speed of Bladecaster for 200 sec.
primary.desc: Increases Attack Speed (by 2 stages)

primary.name: Bladecaster Control
primary.shortDesc: Bladecaster Mastery: +50%\nAttack Power: +30\nCritical Damage: +6%

primary.name: Will to Live
primary.shortDesc: Every 5 sec, restores 4% of Max HP/MP even in combat.

primary.name: Elite Training
primary.shortDesc: STR +60

primary.name: Eviscerate
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 35, Damage: 220%, Number of Attacks: 6, Max Enemies Hit: 6
primary.desc: Slash a sword forward

primary.name: Hunting Decree
primary.shortDesc:
MP Cost: 40, Aether Cost: 100
For each aether sword, Duration: 40 sec, Damage: 240%, Number of Attacks: 2
Can command up to 4 swords. When you exceed the max number and a command is given, the aether sword with the least duration left vanishes.
When attack hits, 15% chance to create aether crystal.
Cooldown: 0.5 sec
primary.desc: Summon Aether Swords that seek out and attack nearby enemies
details: Up to 4 Aether Swords can be active at a time (in 3rd Job)<bp_The oldest Aether Swords will be replaced if the maximum is already active_>
Can only be activated when <tt src={/class-icons/flora/adele/aether-forge.png} tip={Aether Forge (2nd Job)}> is toggled on
Attack has a chance to create a <tt src={/class-icons/flora/adele/aether-crystal.png} tip={Aether Crystal (2nd Job)}>
Unaffected by Damage Reflect

primary.name: Noble Summons
primary.shortDesc:
MP Cost: 50, Max Enemies Hit: 10, Damage: 260%, Number of Attacks: 4
Debuffs enemies for 30 sec. During that time, Adele ignores 10% of those enemies' DEF.
Each successful attack has a 90% chance to create an aether crystal.
Cooldown: 12 sec.
primary.desc: Command all <tt src={/class-icons/flora/adele/hunting-decree.png} tip={Hunting Decree (3rd Job)}> swords to return to you while damaging and debuffing enemies in its path
details: [Debuff]: Adele's attack towards this target has increased %Ignore DEF
Attack has a chance to create a <tt src={/class-icons/flora/adele/aether-crystal.png} tip={Aether Crystal (2nd Job)}>
Unaffected by Damage Reflect and cooldown resets

primary.name: Reign of Destruction
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 120, Territory Duration: 7 sec, Max Enemies Hit: 8, Damage: 100%, Number of Attacks: 4\nThe sword turns when duration ends, attacking an additional 12 times dealing 550% damage up to 12 enemies.\nCooldown: 30 sec
primary.desc: Create a damaing zone of swords
details: At the end of the duration, the attack explodes damaging nearby enemies
Unaffected by Damage Reflect

primary.name: True Nobility
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 200, Creates a spirit field for 20 sec.\nReceive 30% of the damage dealt to party members inside the field and create a shield equal to 80% of that damage. If you take more damage than your remaining HP, you cannot receive that extra damage.\nCooldown: 180 sec
primary.desc: Create a barrier around you where party members redirect some of the damage taken to you by creating a shield for you
details: Pressing the Skill Key again will cancel the shield

primary.name: Feather Float
primary.shortDesc:
MP Cost: 46, Aether Cost: 30
Move back a short distance.
Cooldown: 8 sec
[Passive Effect: Speed: +5, Jump: +10, Max Speed: +10]
primary.desc: Dash backwards
details: [Passive]: Permanently increases Movement Speed, Jump and Max Movement Speed
Can be used while using a "Trigger" skill

primary.name: Ascent
primary.shortDesc:
Attack Power: +30, Final Damage: +17%, Critical Rate: +20%
Magic Dispatch and Aetherial Arms Damage: +115%p
Aether Forge Damage: +240%p
Impale Damage: +100%p
Resonance Rush Damage: +125%p

primary.name: Tolerance
primary.shortDesc: Knockback Resistance: +40%, Max HP: +10%, Status Resistance: +30, Elemental Resistance: +30%\nDamage Taken: -20%

primary.name: Aether Mastery
primary.shortDesc: Obtain up to 400 aether.\nIncreases max aether swords that can be created with Aether Forge, and commanded with Hunting Decree, to 6.
details: Increases max Aether and amount of <tt src={/class-icons/flora/adele/hunting-decree.png} tip={Hunting Decree (3rd Job)}> swords creatable from 4 to 6

primary.name: Cleave
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 40, Damage: 375%, Number of Attacks: 6, Max Enemies Hit: 7
primary.desc: Slash a giant sword forward

primary.name: Aether Bloom
primary.shortDesc:
MP Cost: 80. For each aether sword, Max Enemies Hit: 8, Damage: 650%, Number of Attacks: 8
If one enemy gets hit by Aether Bloom multiple times, the skill's final damage on that enemy is reduced by 25%.
When attack hits, 50% chance to create aether crystal.
Cooldown: 20 sec
primary.desc: Command all <tt src={/class-icons/flora/adele/hunting-decree.png} tip={Hunting Decree (3rd Job)}> swords to spin damaging nearby enemies
details: Duration of Aether Swords will not go down when attack is active
Attack has a chance to create a <tt src={/class-icons/flora/adele/aether-crystal.png} tip={Aether Crystal (2nd Job)}> crystal
If an enemy is hit by multiple Aether Swords, each additional sword deals reduced %Final Damage
Unaffected by Damage Reflect and cooldown resets

primary.name: Grave Proclamation
primary.shortDesc:
MP Cost: 150, Enemies Hit: 1, Damage: 220%, Number of Attacks: 10
Ignores additional 10% defense rate of enemies with mark of death.
If there is an enemy with the mark within attack range of Hunting Decree, or aether swords, Magic Dispatch, or Shardbreaker created by Infinity Blade, the attack will focus on that enemy.
Cooldown: 10 sec
primary.desc: Mark an enemy with a debuff that causes all <tt src={/class-icons/flora/adele/hunting-decree.png} tip={Hunting Decree (3rd Job)}> swords and <tt src={/class-icons/flora/adele/magic-dispatch.png} tip={Magic Dispatch (1st Job)}> to target them
details: [Debuff]: Attacks towards this enemy deals increased %Ignore Def
Pressing the Skill Key again will move to the mark to another target if there is a mark active
Prioritizes enemy with the highest Max HP
Unaffected by cooldown resets

primary.name: Aether Guard
primary.shortDesc:
MP Cost: 150. Key can be held up to 8 sec. Damage taken while key is held, including attacks that deal damage in proportion to Max HP, is reduced by 40%.
If you use this skill the moment you are attacked, it will nullify the damage from that attack and reduce an additional 55% from any further attacks while you're holding the key.
When the skill ends, cooldown is reduced by 3.5 sec for each sec remaining from holding the key.
Cooldown: 60 sec
primary.desc: While held, damage taken including %Max HP attacks is reduced
details: If you press the Skill Key the moment you are attacked, the damage taken is reduced even further while holding the Skill Key
Can be used while using Trigger skills except for <tt src={/class-icons/flora/adele/plummet.png} tip={Plummet (4th Job)}>
Cooldown is reduced based on the duration the skill was held
Unaffected by cooldown resets

primary.name: Plummet
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 45. Drop vertically when used in the air, Damage: 550%, Max Enemies Hit: 6, Number of Attacks: 6\nCooldown: 1.5 sec
primary.desc: Dive downward damaging enemies in your path
details: Can only be used in the air

primary.name: Hero of the Flora
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 70, creates a Flora emblem\n[Passive Effect: All stats with a direct AP investment increase by 15%]
details: Skill is a passive, the active effect does nothing except displays an animation

primary.name: Floran Hero's Will
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 30, Cooldown: 300 sec
primary.desc: Removes certain abnormal status effects and become immune to Abnormal Status for 3 secs
details: Unaffected by <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/paladin/combat-orders.png} tip={Temporarily increases all of your skill levels. Only 4th Job Skills can be increased beyond master level while other skills can only be increased to master level. Exceptions: Some special skills, beginner skills, Combat Orders, hyper skills, 5th job skills, and 6th job skills cannot be increased.}/> Combat Orders

primary.name: Bladecaster Expertise
primary.shortDesc: Bladecaster Mastery: +70%, Attack Power: +30, Damage: +20%
details: Increases %Weapon Mastery and Attack provided

primary.name: Perfection
primary.shortDesc:
Magic Dispatch and Aetherial Arms Damage: +225%p
Aether Forge Damage: +270%p
Impale Damage: +200%p
Resonance Rush Damage: +265%p
Hunting Decree Damage: +120%p
Noble Summons Damage: +300%p
Reign of Destruction Damage: +300%p

primary.name: Ruination
primary.shortDesc: Final Damage: +30%, Enemy DEF Ignored: +20%

primary.name: Strive
primary.shortDesc: Attack Power: +30, Damage: +10%, Critical Rate: +20%, Max HP: +15%

hyperPassive.name: Trigger - Reinforce
details: Increases %Damage of all Trigger skills

hyperPassive.name: Trigger - Guardbreak
details: Increases %Ignore DEF of all Trigger skills

hyperPassive.name: Trigger - Boss Rush
details: Increases %Boss Damage of all Trigger skills

hyperPassive.name: Resonance Rush - Efficiency
hyperPassive.shortDesc: Obtain 20 aether when aether crystal is used for Resonance Rush. Does not consume aether when using Impale.

hyperPassive.name: Will to Live - Aura Reinforce
hyperPassive.shortDesc: Recovery Ratio: +3%, additive to existing recovery.

hyperPassive.name: True Nobility - Shield Reinforce
details: Increases %Damage while shield is active

hyperActive.name: Shardbreaker
hyperActive.shortDesc:
MP Cost: 250, creates a shard in the location of up to 7 enemies.
For each shard that is created and shattered, Max Enemies Hit: 7, Damage: 2000%, Number of Attacks: 6
If total enemies struck is lower than the max, creates up to 7 shards in random locations.
When attacking enemies marked by Grave Proclamation, creates half the shards and hits up to 7 enemies for 2500% damage 6 times.
After shards shatter, creates up to 7 aether crystals.
Cooldown: 60 sec
hyperActive.desc: Creates shards at the location of enemies that explode
details: When attacking enemies marked with <tt src={/class-icons/flora/adele/grave-proclamation.png} tip={Grave Proclamation (4th Job)}>, the attack deals increase damage but fewer shards are created

Creates <tt src={/class-icons/flora/adele/aether-crystal.png} tip={Aether Crystal (2nd Job)}> at the location of the explosion (up to 7 crystals)<bp_If the number of enemies hit is less than the max, crystals will be created in random locations_>

hyperActive.name: Blade Torrent
hyperActive.shortDesc:
MP Cost: 300, Max Enemies Hit: 6, Damage: 1000%, Number of Attacks: 12
Stun Duration: 10 sec
Stun Duration: +100% depending on damage inflicted with Blade Torrent.
Cooldown: 180 sec
hyperActive.desc: Launch swords that bind nearby enemies

hyperActive.name: Divine Wrath
hyperActive.shortDesc: MP Cost: 100, Duration: 60 sec, Damage: +10%\nApplies to any Flora class in the party\nCooldown: 120 sec.

fifthMain.name: Ruin
fifthMain.shortDesc:
MP Cost: 1000, Max Enemies Hit: 15
An attack that deals 550% damage 6 times when summoned and activates 12 times.
After it's summoned, an additional sword pierce deals 990% damage 9 times and activates 8 times.
Cooldown: 60 sec
fifthMain.desc: A giant sword falls down from the sky dealing during the fall and after it lands
details: Unaffected by Damage Reflect

fifthMain.name: Infinity Blade
fifthMain.shortDesc:
MP Cost: 1000, invincible during casting and disarmament
Duration: 30 sec, creates 18 aether swords that attack 2 times with 770% damage
On successful hits, 5% chance to create an aether crystal.
Cooldown 180 sec
fifthMain.desc: Create special Aether Swords that seek out and attack nearby enemies like <tt src={/class-icons/flora/adele/hunting-decree.png} tip={Hunting Decree (3rd Job)}>
details: Infinity Blade Aether Swords are only affected by <tt src={/class-icons/flora/adele/grave-proclamation.png} tip={Grave Proclamation (4th Job)}> and cannot trigger <tt src={/class-icons/flora/adele/noble-summons.png} tip={Noble Summons (3rd Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/flora/adele/aether-bloom.png} tip={Aether Bloom (4th Job)}>
Has a small chance to create a <tt src={/class-icons/flora/adele/aether-crystal.png} tip={Aether Crystal (2nd Job)}> crystal
You are invincible at the initial cast and at the end of the skill
Unaffected by Damage Reflect

fifthMain.name: Legacy Restoration
fifthMain.shortDesc:
2% max MP will be consumed every sec while casting and after casting
Duration: 30 sec, Damage: 45%, Aether obtained: 80%, +2 aether swords that can be commanded with Hunting Decree
Periodically spreads enchanted wings to attack 6 mobs with 1980% damage 3 times and restores 10.5% of max HP for you and your party members.
Cooldown: 180 sec
fifthMain.desc: Increases %Damage, Aether generation rate, and the maximum number of swords commanded by <tt src={/class-icons/flora/adele/hunting-decree.png} tip={Hunting Decree (3rd Job)}>
details: Periodically, your wings flap dealing damage to nearby enemies and healing nearby party members and yourself

fifthMain.name: Storm
fifthMain.shortDesc: MP Cost: 500, Duration: 14 sec. Automatically attacks up to 7 nearby enemies periodically, for 550% damage 2 time(s).\nUpon casting, once more than 2 aether swords have been commanded, the skill's attack count is increased by 2 for each pair of aether swords beyond those first two.\nCooldown: 90 sec.
fifthMain.desc: Create a storm of swords to gather and surround yourself
details: Requires <tt src={/class-icons/flora/adele/hunting-decree.png} tip={Hunting Decree (3rd Job)}> swords to be active to use

When more than 1 pair of <tt src={/class-icons/flora/adele/hunting-decree.png} tip={Hunting Decree (3rd Job)}> swords are active, the attack count is increased by 2 for each pair of swords beyond the first pair
Pressing the Skill Key again will end the skill early
Unaffected by Damage Reflect

fifthBoost.name: Blade of Will Boost
details: [Lv. 20]: Max Targets: +1
[Lv. 40]: Ignore DEF: +20%

fifthBoost.name: Magic Dispatch and Aetherial Arms Boost
fifthBoost.shortDesc: Magic Dispatch and Aetherial Arms Final Damage: +120%
details: [Lv. 20]: Damage Against Normal Enemies: +10%
[Lv. 40]: Ignore DEF: +20%

[Lv. 40]: Ignore DEF: +20%

[Lv. 40]: Ignore DEF: +20%

[Lv. 40]: Ignore DEF: +20%

fifthBoost.shortDesc: Reign of Destruction and Plummet Final Damage: +120%
details: [Lv. 20]: Max Targets: +1
[Lv. 40]: Ignore DEF: +20%

fifthBoost.name: Cleave Boost
details: [Lv. 20]: Max Targets: +1
[Lv. 40]: Ignore DEF: +20%

fifthBoost.name: Hunting Decree and Grave Proclamation Boost
fifthBoost.shortDesc: Hunting Decree and Grave Proclamation Final Damage: +120%
details: [Lv. 20]: Damage Against Normal Enemies: +10%
[Lv. 40]: Ignore DEF: +20%

fifthBoost.name: Aether Bloom/Blade Torrent Boost
fifthBoost.shortDesc: Aether Bloom and Blade Torrent Final Damage: +120%
details: [Lv. 20]: Max Targets: +1
[Lv. 40]: Ignore DEF: +20%

masteryCore.name: 1st Mastery Node
details: Requires <tt src={/class-icons/flora/adele/cleave.png} tip={Cleave (4th Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/flora/adele/magic-dispatch.png} tip={Magic Dispatch and Aetherial Arms (1st Job / 2nd Job)}> enhanced with V Matrix at least Lv. 40 (before Matrix Points) to unlock

masteryCore.name: HEXA Cleave
masteryCore.shortDesc: MP Cost: 55, Max Enemies Hit: 7, Damage: 750%, Number of Attacks: 6\nEvery 6 seconds, the next attack is replaced with enhanced Cleave\n[Enhanced Cleave]: 3 Chase Cuts occur which attack up to 8 enemies with 570% damage 7 times
details: Unlocked with 1st Mastery Node

masteryCore.name: HEXA Magic Dispatch
masteryCore.shortDesc: MP Cost: 30, Damage: 720%, Number of Attacks: 3, Magical Shards: 5\nCooldown: 6 sec
details: Unlocked with 1st Mastery Node

masteryCore.name: HEXA Aetherial Arms
masteryCore.shortDesc: When Trigger Skill hits, creates shard every 6 sec, consume 30 MP upon creation.\nCooldown: 0.5 sec.
details: Unlocked with 1st Mastery Node

masteryCore.name: 2nd Mastery Node
details: Requires <tt src={/class-icons/flora/adele/hunting-decree.png} tip={Hunting Decree and Grave Proclamation (3rd Job / 4th Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/flora/adele/reign-of-destruction.png} tip={Reign of Destruction and Plummet (3rd Job / 4th Job)}> enhanced with V Matrix at least Lv. 40 (before Matrix Points) to unlock

masteryCore.name: HEXA Hunting Decree
masteryCore.shortDesc:
MP Cost: MP 52, Aether Cost: 100
For each aether sword, Duration: 60 sec, Damage: 800%, Number of Attacks: 2
Can command up to 6 swords. When you exceed the max number and a command is given, the aether sword with the least duration left vanishes.
When the attack hits, 15% chance to create aether crystal.
Cooldown: 0.5 sec
details: Unlocked with 2nd Mastery Node

masteryCore.name: HEXA Plummet
masteryCore.shortDesc: MP Cost: 62\nDrop straight down when used in the air, Damage: 815%, Max Enemies Hit: 6, Number of Attacks: 6\nCooldown: 1.5 sec
details: Unlocked with 2nd Mastery Node

originSkill.name: Maestro
originSkill.shortDesc:
MP Cost: 1200, invincible during casting
Summons aether sword and 29 Chase Cuts occur which attack up to 15 enemies with 1370% damage 10 times
Finally, by controlling the aether sword, 57 final blows attack up to 15 enemies with 1370% damage 14 times
Cooldown: 360 sec

meta: Adele is a STR warrior class part of the Flora class group. Adele has a secondary resource (unlocked in 2nd Job) that is used to create 'Aether Swords' that can be commanded
